objects.description: Monitor executed commands and arguments of binaries involved in shutting down or rebooting systems. For network devices, monitor executed commands in AAA logs, especially those run by unexpected or unauthorized users. On ESXi servers, monitor for suspicious commands that terminate VMs, such as `esxcli vm process kill`,  `pkill –9 vmx-*`, or `vim-cmd vmsvc/power.off `.(Citation: Crowdstrike Hypervisor Jackpotting Pt 2 2021)(Citation: Elastic Suspicious Termination of ESXI Process)(Citation: TrendMicro Play)
